**Commit Messages Should Follow**:
- `feat:` A new feature
- `fix:` A bug fix
- `docs:` Documentation changes
- `style:` Code style changes (formatting, semicolons, etc)
- `refactor:` Code refactoring
- `test:` Adding or updating tests
- `chore:` Build process, dependencies, etc
